  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/3538</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/3538</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Com es classifiquen els instruments</string>
            <string language="en">How are the instruments of the orchestra classified?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie werden die Instrumente des Orchesters 
eingestuft?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment les instruments de l'orchestre sont-ils 
classifiés ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como os instrumentos do orchestra são 
classificados?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come gli strumenti dell'orchestra sono 
classificati?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς τα όργανα της ορχήστρας ταξινομούνται;</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Pregunta amb resposta (PAR) en la qual s'expliquen els criteris per ordenar els instruments segons les seves característiques com a productors i emissors de sons.</string>
            <string language="en">Question and answer (PAR) explaining the criteria for classifying musical instruments according to the way they produce and transmit sound.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">música</string>
            <string language="en">music</string>
            <string language="es">música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">instrument musical</string>
            <string language="en">musical instrument</string>
            <string language="es">instrumento musical</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Frage und Antwort (DURCHSCHNITTLICH) die Kriterien 
für das Einstufen der Musikinstrumente entsprechend der Methode 
erklärend produzieren sie und übertragen Ton.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Question et réponse (PAR) expliquant les critères pour
classifier les instruments musicaux selon la voie ils produisent et 
transmettent le bruit.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pergunta e resposta (PAR) que explica os critérios para 
classificar instrumentos musicais de acordo com a maneira produzem e 
transmitem o som.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Domanda e risposta (PAR) che spiega i test di verifica per
classificare gli strumenti musicali secondo il modo producono e 
trasmettono il suono.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ερωταποκρίσεις (ΙΣΟΤΙΜΙΑ) που εξηγούν τα κριτήρια για 
την ταξινόμηση των μουσικών οργάνων σύμφωνα με τον τρόπο που 
παράγουν και διαβιβάζουν τον ήχο.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musikinstrument</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">musique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">instrument musical</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">instrumento musical</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">musica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">strumento musicale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μουσική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μουσικό όργανο</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
